scripts.sqlite-v6: pnpm --filter usage-sqlite-v6 gen; pnpm --filter usage-sqlite-v6 test
scripts.sqlite-v7: pnpm --filter usage-sqlite-v7 gen; pnpm --filter usage-sqlite-v7 test
scripts.mysql-v6: pnpm --filter usage-mysql-v6 gen; pnpm --filter usage-mysql-v6 test
scripts.mysql-v7: pnpm --filter usage-mysql-v7 gen; pnpm --filter usage-mysql-v7 test
scripts.pg-v6: pnpm --filter usage-pg-v6 gen; pnpm --filter usage-pg-v6 test
scripts.pg-v7: pnpm --filter usage-pg-v7 gen; pnpm --filter usage-pg-v7 test
